title: Yukon - Charley Rivers National Preserve: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         NPS Photo by Josh Spice  The preserve is open year round.   The field office in Eagle, Alaska, is open 7 days a week, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., from mid-May to Labor Day.  From Labor Day to mid-May the Eagle Field Office is open Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.  The Fairbanks office, located at 4175 Geist Road, is open all year, Monday to Friday, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.   For information on winter road closures contact http://511.alaska.gov  Get current weather forecasts for Eagle & Circle, Alaska.    Learn about seasonal weather in the preserve.
